title: FS: T206 – PSA & SGC graded – some less common backs
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS: T206 – PSA & SGC graded – some less common backs
posts.post_content:
Selling off some of my doubles.  

PSA 4
Milan, American Beauty 350 Frame - good color, tiny stain on back - $110  SOLD
Doyle (With Bat), Polar Bear - nice image, no creases - $55 SOLD
Oakes, Polar Bear - nice image, no creases - $55 SOLD

PSA 4 (MK)
Schaeffer (Detroit), Sovereign 150, corner crease, pencil writing on back, tuff front/back combo - $40 

SGC 40/3
Berger, Sweet Caporal 350-460/42 Overprint (Scroll), no creases - $45 SOLD
Street (Catching), Sweet Caporal 350-460/42 Overprint (Scroll), no creases, perfect image - $45 SOLD
Phelan, Sovereign 350, no creases, perfect image, back has some discoloration - $35 SOLD
Shaw (St. Louis), El Principe de Gales, light corner crease top left, clean back - $55  SOLD
Lord, Piedmont 350, tiny corner crease, nice color, clean, $38

SGC 50/4
Howell (Portrait), Sweet Caporal 350/30, no creases, perfect image - $50 TRADED

The fine print:

E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts.  Please e-mail me at sschris at att dot net if interested.

Prices include shipping. Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).  I am not responsible for damage that occurs during shipping.

Regular Paypal preferred, but other arrangements can be made.  

Also open to trades for other T206s with less common backs that I need.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE - I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME.  RESPONSES WILL MOST LIKELY BE SENT IN THE EVENING.  I will reply to all e-mails.

Thanks for looking.

Steve

Steve,

Email was sent regarding Shaw.

Best,

Andy
